channel.title: Nether portals
channel.description: How do i link nether portals? last time i made one i went in and went back through the one i teleported to and ended up at eddy's house.

item.title: Nether portals
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

yea i moved and now it generated a new portal in the nether for me thank you:p

Read full topic

item.title: Nether portals
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Nether and World (regular map) X and Y are different to a point. The Nether to World portals, are created at NetherX15 % Nether15, while, the Wold portals are created at WorldX/15 and WorldY/15. Best I can explain it. If Eddy’s portal is around yours, and within that range, you will go back to his portal every time. Just move your portal more than 15 blocks away in the X and Y directions.

Read full topic
